shukranuwa kiyanne chalanaya wenda puluwan, samanya sailawalata wada punchi wagema samanya warnadeha sankhyawen ardhayak (23) thiyena sailayak.me shukranuwe hisa kotase thamayi warnadeha adanguwana nyashtiya thiyenne.hisa udin thiyena akrosomaya kiyanne hariyata bombayak wage ekak.eeka athule thiyenawa ensayima rashiyak.shukranuwak gihilla dimbayak ekka set wenakota dimbaye biththiya siduru karanda awashya karana ensayima thamayi akrosomaye thiyenne.mada kotasa kiyana pradeshaye thamayi shukranuwe chalanayata awashya karana shakthiya nipadawana mayitakondriya thiyenne.waligaya hewath natta thiyenne ithin pinanda.
